Template.TextPart:
Dear {{name}},
Welcome to OnWhichDate.com! Thank you for verifying your registration. Your login account is:
 {{email}} 
We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, head over to https://onwhichdate.com, enter your email and click the magic link sent to you. This is secure, and you never have to store and remember a password for us.
For the next 60 minutes, you can use the link below to login immediately.
{{magicLink}}
We suggest you start with a few important documents to get started. Our 'Quick' method is a great starting point. (look for ⚡ quick in the left panel).
Additional References

go to account to set some defaults, they'll save you time.
visit tips for some cool techniques that'll save you even more time!
check out our plans - they're amazingly affordable.
we're always listening; got suggestions or issues? go to support to submit them.

We hope to serve you years to come,
sincerely, 
team OWD!
Template.HtmlPart:
Dear {{name}},

Welcome to OnWhichDate.com! Thank you for verifying your registration. Your login account is:

{{email}}

We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, head over to https://onwhichdate.com, enter your email and click the magic link sent to you. This is secure, and you never have to store and remember a password for us.

For the next 60 minutes, you can use the link below to login immediately.

{{magicLink}}

We suggest you start with a few important documents to get started. Our 'Quick' method is a great starting point. (look for ⚡ quick in the left panel).

Additional References

  1. go to account to set some defaults, they'll save you time.
  2. visit tips for some cool techniques that'll save you even more time!
  3. check out our plans - they're amazingly affordable.
  4. we're always listening; got suggestions or issues? go to support to submit them.

We hope to serve you years to come,

sincerely,

team OWD!
